segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is already soaked, and her foot is standing right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before the whole kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, but she doesn’t even glance their way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while everything around her is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy is standing on looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in for quite a shock when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something before this turns into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
